Package com.atgenomix.seqslab.piper.plugin.api.executor

package com.atgenomix.seqslab.piper.plugin.api.executor

  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Executor
    An operator object responsible for preprocessing (localizing) input dataframe as managed table for Spark SQL command or saving to local files for shell command execution; and it is also responsible for evaluating and updating command expression placeholders.
    ExecutorSupport
    Factory object responsible for creating Executor operators.
    SupportsFileLocalization
    The executor operator implementing this feature supports saving input dataframe to local file system for shell command execution.
    SupportsTableLocalization
    The executor operator implementing this feature supports returning a DataFrame table for SQL command execution.
